tableGroups.title: DataTable Selection Props
tableGroups.description: Row selection controls available on the DataTable component.

items.name: enableRowSelection
items.description: Enable row selection with checkboxes. Can be a boolean or a function that returns boolean per row.

items.name: enableMultiRowSelection
items.description: Allow selecting multiple rows. Set to false for single selection mode.

items.name: selectMode
items.description: Selection scope: 'page' limits selection to current page, 'all' allows cross-page selection with include/exclude logic.

items.name: isRowSelectable
items.description: Function to control which rows can be selected. MUST be memoized with useCallback to prevent infinite re-renders.

items.name: onSelectionChange
items.description: Callback invoked when selection state changes. Receives SelectionState object with ids and type.

items.name: enableBulkActions
items.description: Display bulk actions toolbar when rows are selected.

items.name: bulkActions
items.description: Render function that returns custom bulk action buttons based on selection state.

tableGroups.title: SelectionState Structure
tableGroups.description: The structure of the selection state object passed to callbacks.

items.name: ids
items.description: Array of row IDs. Meaning depends on the 'type' property.

items.name: type
items.description: Selection type: 'include' means ids are selected rows, 'exclude' means ids are NOT selected (all others selected).

items.name: checkboxSelection
items.description: Props for the selection checkbox component (used in selection column).

items.name: bulkActionsToolbar
items.description: Props for the bulk actions toolbar that appears when rows are selected.

items.name: selectionColumn
items.description: Props for the selection column (size, alignment, pinning, etc.).
